personalInfo.name: Vaishnavi Kadam
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full Stack Developer specializing in JavaScript, PHP, and modern web technologies. Experienced in developing efficient web applications and optimizing enterprise software. Combining technical expertise with a passion for AI to create innovative solutions.

description: Engineered a voice recording and transcription system with OpenAI Whisper and Google Speech-to-Text, improving speech recognition and clarity by 45% in clinical tests with Parkinsonâ€™s patients.

Developed and integrated AI-driven, personalized speech therapy tasks utilizing ChatGPT, tailoring content to individual user profiles and resulting in a 35% increase in user engagement and motivation, as reported by early user testing
Implemented advanced speech analysis techniques using PRAAT, reducing speech metric errors by 50% and preparing for large-scale validation with 10,000 Parkinson's UK participants.

Spearheaded development of full-stack web applications, driving impactful contributions across both frontend and backend domains, with a 40% increase in user-to-user interaction through a real-time chat feature.

Facilitated weekly sprint meetings for a 4-person team, ensuring on-time delivery of all project milestones and resolving 20+ critical bugs within a 2-week sprint, ensuring optimal system performance.

Analyzed historical data on channel acquisition costs, viewership, and profitability, securing 15% better deals on targeted channels aligned with customer preferences, leading to a 10% increase in profit margin.

Developed a demographic & content-based channel viewership prediction model using Python, enhancing decision-making processes and building impactful data visualization dashboards for clear communication of insights.

education.institution: Shah & Anchor Kutchhi Engineering College, University of Mumbai
